Mike Pence shut the door today on a run for the presidency, but left open the likelihood that he'll seek a different office: Governor of Indiana. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mike Pence , R-Columbus, said of himself and wife Karen in a letter being sent to supporters.`` We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.'' I came this morning to the Egyptian Museum and found that some had tried to raid the museum by force last night,'' Zahi Hawass , chairman of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, said on Saturday. Egyptian citizens tried to prevent them and were joined by the tourism police, but some( looters) managed to enter from above and they destroyed two of the mummies, he said. He added looters had also ransacked the ticket office.

coupons statement Thursday, Google's Eric Schmidt , announced that he will hand over the title of chief executive to Google co-founder Larry Page in April. In a message sent out on Twitter, Eric Schmidt said: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed!
